name: Amruta !!
greetingText: Thank you for being the best friend I could ever ask for!
wishText: May the god's blessings always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Amrut!! Many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special for me and this is your first Birthday after we met!
wishHeading: A very big Happy Birthday from Shivam!
outroText: Okay,Now tell me have you liked it?
